brief.content-text: The diagram depicts four switches arranged in a square topology with all switches connected to each other. The switches are labeled S1, S2, S3, and S4. S3 has been labeled the root bridge, and has the lowest priority number of 4096. S2 has a priority number of 32768, while S1 has a priority number of 32768, and S4 has a priority number of 8192.
